name: The Unholy Black Knight - Fighter 8 / WM 7 / BG 25
author: magaiti

posts.author: magaiti
posts.content:
This build is based on The Black Knight (Fighter8/WM7/BG25) by Urgos
http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 22092.html

I have made some reshuffling and added divine feats to the mix.
The build ends with only 16 CHA, so it relies on CHA-boosting items to fuel divine feats.

Weapon choice: any Martial. My choice is Scimitar for crit range.

Basically, this is a tank with WM-powered crits, DevCrit, EWS, 8d6 Sneak Attack, and AC boosted by Expertise and Divine Shield.
Oh, and he can also summon an Epic Vrock for some distraction.
